Community Impact

The John Carroll and Jim O’Brien Clubhouse in Indio opened its doors to the community in 1966. Today, that one small clubhouse has grown into an organization comprised of a network of four full-service clubhouses, two boxing/athletic centers, and the Smilow Family Teen Center in Indio.

We strive to give our club members and our communities a better and brighter future. We meet kids and teens where they are and help them to take steps forward to reach their potential. By focusing on safety, academic support and character development.

Impact Report 2017-2018 Annual Report 2017-2018

Over 6,043 Boys & Girls Clubs Youth

6,165

hours of community service completed by Club youth

81,945

free meals and snacks were provided for Club youth during the year

98%

of members are on track to pass the next grade level

802

children visit a clubhouse or an after-school site every day

77%

of members are eligible for free or reduced lunch at their schools
